name: Color Me Up!
description:
Simple "the floor is lava" game made with Unreal Engine 4 .

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Joystick : Move : Left thumbstick 

Face buttons : 

A = Green

B = Red

X = Blue

Y = Yellow

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Keyboard :

Directional Arrows : Move

A = Yellow

S =  Green

D = Blue

W = Red

-------------------------------------------------------------------

ESC = Exit game.

Credits : Manoloon (Gameplay, development and idea)

Sound FX from the Matias Cerviño Free HD Sound Effects 1 INDICT
